dpath_bids.description: This directory contains the raw dataset converted to the BIDS standard.

dpath_derivatives.description: This directory contains the outputs of image processing pipelines. Outputs of different pipelines are stored in `<pipeline_name>/<pipeline_version>` subdirectories. Each subdirectory has two additional subdirectories: one for the actual output (under `output`) and one for temporary files created during processing (under `work`).

dpath_sourcedata.description: This directory is for the unorganized or arbitrarily organized source data (imaging and tabular).

dpath_src_tabular.description: This directory is for the unorganized or arbitrarily organized tabular data.

dpath_src_imaging.description: This directory is for the unorganized or arbitrarily organized imaging data (files and archives).

dpath_downloads.description: This directory is for downloaded data archives (e.g., tarballs or zipped files).

dpath_pre_reorg.description: This directory is for arbitrarily organized source imaging files.

dpath_post_reorg.description: This directory is for the organized source data that is ready for BIDS conversion.

dpath_code.description: This directory is for custom code at the study level.

dpath_hpc.description: This directory is for HPC job submission templates. It can be deleted if HPC job submission is not needed.

dpath_containers.description: This directory is for storing the container image files for the BIDS conversion/processing pipelines.

dpath_pipelines.description: This directory is for storing the Nipoppy configuration information and custom code.

dpath_scratch.description: This directory is for temporary/working files.

dpath_pybids_db.description: This directory is for PyBIDS databases generated/used during processing.

dpath_work.description: This directory is for temporary/working files generated/used during processing.

dpath_tabular.description: This directory is for tabular/phenotypic data.

dpath_assessments.description: This directory is for assessments data.

fpath_config.description: The configuration file for the study/dataset where all data processing is configured.

fpath_curation_status.description: The curation status file is generated/updated internally and is used to keep track of the raw data organization and BIDSification process.

fpath_manifest.description: The manifest file lists all expected study participants and visits.

fpath_processing_status.description: The processing status file lists availability of derived imaging data and pipeline processing statuses.

fpath_demographics.description: The demographics file contains demographic information for study participants.
